connection.title: Configure your API keys below. If you don't have an account, you can create new one here.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Select between "Sandbox" or "Live" to link your shop to the respective environment.

pspid.title: PSPID
pspid.description: Enter your PSPID from our platform that you want to use for transaction processing.

apiKey.title: API key
apiKey.description: Enter the API Key of your sandbox or live PSPID.
apiKey.error: API key must not be empty.

apiSecret.title: API Secret
apiSecret.description: Enter the API Secret of your sandbox or live PSPID.
apiSecret.error: API Secret must not be empty.

webhooksKey.title: Webhooks Key
webhooksKey.description: Enter the Webhooks Key of your sandbox or live PSPID.
webhooksKey.error: Webhooks Key must not be empty.

webhooksSecret.title: Webhooks Secret
webhooksSecret.description: Enter the Webhooks Secret of your sandbox or live PSPID.
webhooksSecret.error: Webhooks Secret must not be empty.

webhooksUrl.title: Webhooks URL
webhooksUrl.description: To avoid copy/paste issues, use the "copy" icon to copy the URL.

payments.title: Here you can enable the payment methods that will appear at checkout. Enabling a payment method will apply the default settings. To customize these settings, click the three dots and than Settings button.

statuses.label: Status
statuses.selectPlaceholder: Select a status to filter by

name.label: Checkout name
name.description: The payment method name that will be appear on checkout. It must be translatable to all supported storefront languages.

enableOnCheckout.label: Enable on checkout
enableOnCheckout.description: Enables or disables payment method on checkout.

templateName.label: Template name
templateName.description: If empty, the standard payment page will be displayed.

instantPayment.label: Instant payment only
instantPayment.description: Define whether you wish to only accept payments that are instant using this payment method

sessionTimeout.label: Session Timeout
sessionTimeout.description: Customers attempting to process their payment past this time limit will not be allowed to complete their transaction. Allowed value ranges from 1 minute to 1440 minutes (24 hours).

productId.label: Product ID
productId.description: Define the brand associated to your Intersolve giftcard by providing us the exact payment product Id to be used.

logo.label: Upload an image
logo.error: Provide a file in one of the supported image types (PNG, JPG, JPEG).

switchToStore.title: Unsaved changes
switchToStore.description: Changes you made are not saved. Are you sure that you want to proceed with switching to another store?

paymentSettings.title: Payment settings
paymentSettings.description: Configure the default settings for all payment methods.

paymentCapturedStatus.title: Payment accepted status mapping
paymentCapturedStatus.description: Please do not change this option unless you are completely aware of how the order status flow works in the shop.

paymentErrorStatus.title: Payment error status mapping
paymentErrorStatus.description: Please do not change this option unless you are completely aware of how the order status flow works in the shop.

paymentPendingStatus.title: Pending payment status mapping
paymentPendingStatus.description: Please do not change this option unless you are completely aware of how the order status flow works in the shop.

paymentAuthorizedStatus.title: Authorized payment status mapping
paymentAuthorizedStatus.description: Please do not change this option unless you are completely aware of how the order status flow works in the shop.

paymentCancelledStatus.title: Cancelled payment status mapping
paymentCancelledStatus.description: Please do not change this option unless you are completely aware of how the order status flow works in the shop.

paymentRefundedStatus.title: Refunded payment status mapping
paymentRefundedStatus.description: Please do not change this option unless you are completely aware of how the order status flow works in the shop.

attemptNumber.title: Number of payment attempts
attemptNumber.description: Define how many attempts are allowed per payment attempt for one customer.
attemptNumber.error: Number of payment attempts has to be between 1 and 10.

applySurcharge.title: Apply surcharge
applySurcharge.description: The surcharge will allow you to ask for an additional amount from the customer based on the card used.

cardsSettings.title: Cards settings
cardsSettings.description: Configure the default settings for cards payment methods.

enable3ds.title: Enable 3-D secure authentication
enable3ds.description: This means that both the challenge flow (where strong customer authentication is needed) and the frictionless flow (where the issuing bank will take full liability) can be triggered.

enforceStrongAuthentication.title: Enforce strong customer authentication for every payment

3dsExemption.title: Enable 3DS exemption
3dsExemption.description:
By enabling the 3DS Exemption, you allow the card issuer and your acquirer to evaluate the risk level of transactions up to the Exemption Limit you specify in EUR. If the criteria are met, your customers will be exempt from Strong Customer Authentication (SCA).

If your acquirer rejects the exemption and requires SCA, this is referred to as a soft decline. In such cases, we will attempt to prompt the customer for SCA and reinitiate the transaction if the customer successfully authenticates.

exemptionType.title: Exemption type
exemptionType.description:
The Low-Value exemption is suitable for transactions below the specified monetary threshold of 30 EUR, allowing these low-value transactions a change to bypass Strong Customer Authentication (SCA) and streamline the checkout process.

On the other hand, the Transaction-Risk-Analysis exemption enables a dynamic risk assessment for your transactions. The card issuer and your acquirer will evaluate the transaction based on various risk factors, allowing transactions up to a limit of 100 EUR to qualify for exemption if they are deemed low risk.

exemptionLimit.title: Exemption Limit
exemptionLimit.description:
The exemption limit is specified in EUR. Therefore, if the checkout currency is not in EUR, the conversion will depend on the exchange rate to EUR. It is essential to have EUR configured in your environment, and to ensure accurate conversions, please keep your exchange rates updated.

If EUR is not configured, the 3DS exemption will not be applied, and the transaction will not have the exemption requested.

Additional Note: PSD2 designates the EUR as the base currency for determining exemption limits for other currencies in the EEA. However, each region can decide to adapt these limits, and regions outside the EEA may also support exemption requests. Due to these complexities, we cannot guarantee that the exemption request will be considered by the issuer or your acquirer.

logSettings.title: Log settings
logSettings.description: Enable debug mode to capture detailed logs for troubleshooting and testing purposes.

logDays.title: Logging records lifetime (day)
logDays.error: Number of days has to be between 1 and 14.

payByLinkSettings.title: Pay by link settings
payByLinkSettings.description: Configure the default settings for Pay by Link.
payByLinkSettings.message: Pay by link settings successfully saved.
payByLinkSettings.error: Failed to save pay by link settings.

payByLinkTitle.title: Pay by Link title
payByLinkTitle.description: Define the name of the Pay By Link payment method in shop back-office.

expirationTime.title: Default expiration time
expirationTime.description: Define the default expiration time in days.
expirationTime.error: Default expiration time has to be between 0 and 180 days.

disconnect.title: Disconnect
disconnect.warning: Please note that configuration and data will be deleted.

search.placeholder: Search by Order ID or Payment number
